metadata.title: CVE-2024-24790 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The various Is methods (IsPrivate, IsLoopback, etc) did not work asexpected for IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses, returning false for addresseswhich would return true in their traditional IPv4 forms.

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
